info.title: CGW - Mobile APP API
info.description: Backend service API for all external functions of CoinGarden Mobile API.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter the results using OData syntax.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Trim the fields returned using OData syntax

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order the results using OData syntax.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of results to skip.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of results to return.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand functionality can be used to query related data. For example, to get the Course data for each Enrollment entity, include ?$expand=course
